name: Hi, Vmind!
description:
The Vmind are invading earth! You are the hivemind controlling these insectoid invaders, guiding them through 16 screens of a labyrintine forest!

However, you can not give orders to your individual bodies - ALL of them will follow your EVERY command! 

Controls

  • Arrows or WASD to move all Vmind
  • X or Enter to perform all Vmind's special actions
  • R to restart a level

Made for GGJ 2015, Hi, Vmind! is a simple puzzle game that introduces new elements to its levels.
